revised_title: SH2 and SH3 Domains in Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Signaling Pathways
tldr: This article discusses the role of SH2 and SH3 domains in the signaling pathways of receptor tyrosine kinases. These domains help in the activation of biochemical signaling pathways in cells stimulated with growth factors. The study also highlights the mechanism by which tyrosine kinases activate SH2-containing proteins and couple to Ras, a crucial signaling pathway for cell growth and differentiation.
